title: REEP tables 5m Euros to boost Tanzania’s food production, renewable energy
desc: VIENNA: THE Director of Strategy and Development at REEEP, headquartered in Vienna, James Smith, said his organization has received a grant of 5m Euros (approximately 15bn/-) to support Tanzanian companies in increasing food production, particularly in the agricultural sector through the use of renewable energy.
